ComicInfo.Series: Tarot: Witch of the Black Rose
ComicInfo.Summary:
Tarot's body lies lifeless on a marble slab as her spirit continues to journey through the Tarot deck in her quest to find the Sword of the Black Rose. Now, with time running out on her life, Tarot must confront the Devil herself in order to complete her mission and return to the Mortal plane. Meanwhile, the Skeleton Man battles for his life as he is hunted down on the Witch Island by a blood- thirsty mob of Dragon Witches.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-02-15 22:25:58. [CVDB121331]
